description.raw:
This is a fairly large PR, but there are a lot of connect pieces. Key improvements:

‌

1. Systems are now available. An example Physics system is in place. This system is just an example, and will be removed/updated when we integrate with ign-physics.
2. PoseComponent has been added. This is also  just a simple example. In reality we will not have such low-level components.
3. It is possible for a system to inform the server about the types of entities the system requires. This happens through an EntityQuery.
4. The ComponentManager has been expanded and renamed EntityComponentManager. This new class manages Component, Entities, and what components belong to what entity.

There are a lot of `todos` in the code indicating what will be worked on in the near future.

Right now the only major output difference can be seen with:

`ign-gazebo -s -f test/worlds/shapes.sdf`

The above should output the initial pose values of each model.
